mapper.select: SELECT infected_region_id AS region_id , COUNT(*) AS 'count' FROM `epidemic_case` WHERE `illness_id`=( SELECT `illness_id` FROM `epidemic_illness` WHERE `illness_name`=#{illness_name} ) GROUP BY infected_region_id ORDER BY region_id

SELECT DATEDIFF(cure_time,infect_time) AS diff_time,COUNT(*) AS cure_count FROM `epidemic_case` WHERE `illness_id`=( SELECT `illness_id` FROM `epidemic_illness` WHERE `illness_name`=#{illness_name} ) AND is_cure = 1 GROUP BY diff_time ORDER BY diff_time
